heading: Facilities
description: State-of-the-art infrastructure and modern facilities to support comprehensive business education.

facilities.name: Smart Classrooms
facilities.description: Modern classrooms equipped with audio-visual aids, interactive boards, and high-speed internet connectivity for enhanced learning experience.

facilities.name: Computer Labs
facilities.description: Well-equipped computer labs with latest software and applications for business analytics, accounting, and digital marketing.

facilities.name: Library
facilities.description: Comprehensive library with extensive collection of business books, journals, and digital resources including e-UTU and RefRead access.

facilities.name: Seminar Halls
facilities.description: Spacious seminar halls for guest lectures, workshops, and presentations by industry experts and professionals.

facilities.name: Business Incubation Center
facilities.description: CBII and iHUB Shivalik provide incubation support for students interested in entrepreneurship and startups.

facilities.name: Training & Placement Cell
facilities.description: Dedicated placement cell offering career counseling, skill development programs, and placement assistance.
